data.title: Penny Millionaire
data.teaser:
This is a social community performance, trying to achieve to become a community penny millionaire in just 100 DAYS. 

If you can never become a millionaire on your own, NOW you have the chance to....in a community, in euro cents (1.000.000 Cents). How much are you willing to contribute to a community possessing ONE MILLION cents.....become a part, become rich, become beautiful, become powerful.....because your friends will do the same....
answers: become a part, become rich, become beautiful, become powerful...become a millionair!
Everyone who is not yet a millionair
Because if you are poor, you are nothing in this world....therefore become a part of the bling bling society
Will be spend by Levko Wernag
